nodes.text: Funeral of the Jedi Temple bombing victims

In 19.1 BBY, a funeral was held for the six Jedi Knights who had perished in the bombing of the Jedi Temple Hangar. One of the victims was Tutso Mara. The funeral was attended by Jedi, Republic senators, and members of the Republic Military. Grand Master Yoda delivered a eulogy for the fallen Jedi.
